page: PH49016: Nuclear %26 Particle Physics Lab I

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: 1. To verify the Rutherfords formula of scattering from Coulomb potential 2. To study the plateau characteristics of a G-M counter 3. To study the nature of the G-M counter pulses 4. To determine the dead time of a G-M counter 5. To verify the inverse square law for nuclear radiations 6. To determine the range of beta-rays 7. To determine the absorption coefficient of aluminum for beta -rays from 137Cs 8. To study the Z-dependence of the absorption coefficient for beta -rays from 137Cs 9. To study the energy dependence of the absorption coefficient of aluminum for gamma-rays 10. To study the statistical nature of nuclear radiations using a G-M counter 11. To study the bulk-etch rate of CR-39 plastic track detector 12. To study the alpha particle tracks in CR-39 plastic track detector 13. To study the pulse shaping in preamplifier-amplifier combination
page: PH49016: Nuclear %26 Particle Physics Lab I
